greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Möbius transform of A053645(n), distance to the largest power of 2 less than or equal to n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: With[{s = Array[# - 2^Floor@ Log2@ # &, 95]}, Table[DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] s[[#]] &], {n, Length@ s}]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 13 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 11 2018
